Based on the provided context, here is a refined answer:

To take a backup of alert definitions that might have been modified or customized, follow these steps:

1. Go to Admin > Config > Alerts > Manage Alert Definitions.
2. Select the folder containing the desired alert definitions and click Export Selected Definitions to backup individual definitions or select Alert definitions and click Export All Definitions for all available alerts.

Note: In versions earlier than SRM 4.3, keep a copy of the alerting-contexts.xml from /opt/APG/Backends/Alerting-Backend/conf directory.

In SRM 4.3.x and later versions, go to Alerting Frontend UI, under Local Manager, click Alert Definitions.

The backup of threshold values does not require an explicit backup of alert definitions as they are retained after upgrade (no specific page or section is referenced in the context).

To add an alerting context, right-click the desired alert definition and select Configure Options.
